sentences: Otsustas talu rendile anda, ära müüa.
context: In Estonian, 'talu' refers to a small agricultural farm that includes land and the buildings on it. It can be described by size (suur/ väike - large/small), wealth (jõukas/vaene - rich/poor), and can have various purposes like dairy farming or tourism. The term encompasses not just the physical structures but also the agricultural operation as a whole.
